title: 美国正在向日本求助试剂盒
contents:
日本自己都不想给自己国民测，再给美国赞助点，这操作会不会秀破天际。
还有川大大MAGA喊的震天响，能不能出来解释一下美国国内有没有试剂盒产能，是不是都烂在中国了，为什么韩国就能排出给几十万人测试的计划。

消息来源：https://www.hawaiipublicradio.org/post/schatz-criticizes-federal-response-coronavirus-seeks-test-kits-japan#stream/0

Schatz Criticizes Federal Response To Coronavirus, Seeks Test Kits From Japan

https://www.hawaiinewsnow.com/video/2020/02/21/schatz-criticizes-federal-government-delivery-coronavirus-test-kits-is-delayed-until-march/

Schatz criticizes federal government as delivery of coronavirus test kits is delayed until March
